}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This is a very small module (290x200mm). :[[Atheros]] AR9485 (WiFi) + AR3012 (BT)
Identifies in Windows as a '''Atheros AR9485WB-EG Wireless Network Adapter'''.
*ASUS Zenbook UX21/UX31 - [https://www.amazon.co.uk/Azurewave-AW-NB086-AR9485WB-EG-Bluetooth-04G030008410/dp/B00U8ZRO7Y 04G030008410] ([http://www.ebay.ie/itm/W-LAN-Combo-slim-Module-AzureWave-802-11-b-g-n-for-Asus-UX31E-1B-/162542161972 UX31E-1B]) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/ANATEL/02823-11-04533 ANATEL/02823-11-04533]
according to this patch: :http://www.spinics.net/lists/linux-wireless/msg108539.html this card based on CUS198 reference design.
